notes.welcomeContent:
Welcome to {{productName}} Notes! Here's how to use it.

{{productName}} Notes is a note-taking feature that can be synchronized across devices. To enable synchronization, you need to sign in to {{productName}} with a Mozilla account.
{{productName}} Notes are stored in {{productName}} and synchronized across devices using Firefox Sync. Firefox Sync encrypts the content of the synchronization with your Mozilla account password, so no one can know its contents.
notes.noNotesSelected: Select a note or create a new one
